ivar_sr schrieb:
> Thanks so much for the config information. I have merged my 
> configuration as I would like to go to a single site. Here is my 
> complete config with the merge but has validation problem. The 
> version that I'm using is 2.0.0
> 
> Problem:
>

> rules:rules:1:regexp

Hi Ravi,

do you get it working using the 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT or are there still
validation problems?

I may send you the patched jar-files I'm currently using
for my diploma thesis, if you can't get it working with the
2.0.1-SNAPSHOT. Just let me know if you whould like to have it.

Christian
